CONTENT1: Application web responsive for searching movies using the services of the popular API TheMovieDB.
The most popular movies are listed starting with the most recent releases.
This app is created using Bootstrap 4.6 y Angular 10. To change the language it is used
the library ngx-translate. For the slideshow it is used the library Swiper.
Also it's used somes operators Rxjs like Tap and Map.

CONTENT2: Application that connects by Rest Services with the backend to create,
read, update and delete commercial invoices according to the profile of the logged in user.
The application is developed using Angular for the frontend and it's used Api Rest to communicate with the Backend, which is
developed with Java, Springboot and MySql. It has two test users
an administrator who allows creating, deleting, updating, uploading pictures and an user who is allowed just to read the information
